SEARCH
Package org.nse.thesis.wordindex

Interface WordIndex

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferedJavaWordIndex, FFMWordIndex, JavaWordIndex, JNAWordIndex, JNIWordIndex
public interface WordIndex extends AutoCloseable
Index that indexes words to their positions in the file.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    WordIndex.ContextBytes
    Context used in WordIndex queries, to specify the amount of leading and trailing bytes surrounding the queried word.
    static interface 
    WordIndex.Provider
    Provides WordIndex implementation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    MIN_INDEXING_BUFFER_SIZE
    When indexed file is read, this is the minimum buffer size, IF index supports buffered reading.
    static final int
    MIN_QUERY_BUFFER_SIZE
    When index is queried, this is the minimum buffer size results are read into, IF index supports buffered reading.
    static final int
    MIN_WORD_CAPACITY_ESTIMATE
    Index hash container is at least this big.
    static final int
    TERM_BUFFER_MARK
    4 byte mark on query buffer that indicates there is no more bytes to read.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    @NotNull Collection<String>
    getWords(@NotNull String word, WordIndex.ContextBytes ctx)
    Query the index for all occurrences of words from indexed file, with specified amount of context, on both sides of the word.
    @NotNull WordContextIterator
    iterateWords(@NotNull String word, WordIndex.ContextBytes ctx)
    Queries the index with word with context, results can be accessed through an iterator.

  • Method Details

    • getWords

      @NotNull @NotNull Collection<String> getWords(@NotNull @NotNull String word, @NotNull WordIndex.ContextBytes ctx)
      Query the index for all occurrences of words from indexed file, with specified amount of context, on both sides of the word.
      Parameters:
      word - Word to search for.
      ctx - The amount of context bytes to surround the word.
      Returns:
      Collection of words with context.

    • iterateWords

      @NotNull @NotNull WordContextIterator iterateWords(@NotNull @NotNull String word, @NotNull WordIndex.ContextBytes ctx) throws FileNotFoundException
      Queries the index with word with context, results can be accessed through an iterator.
      Parameters:
      word - Word to search for.
      ctx - The amount of context bytes to surround the word.
      Returns:
      Iterator that iterates over the results.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If indexed file was deleted.
